data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
BTRIEVE::FileIO provides methods for common Btrieve operations (on
    top of BTRIEVE::Native).

    Alternative namespaces were discussed at module-authors@perl.org:

    <http://www.xray.mpe.mpg.de/mailing-lists/module-authors/2003-12/msg00064.html>

    Finally, Tim Bunce advised the BTRIEVE::FileIO namespace:

    <http://www.xray.mpe.mpg.de/mailing-lists/module-authors/2003-12/msg00094.html>
